item.description:
I am leading a dog-friendly hike for the 4 Seasons Hiking Meetup Group and thought I would post it for the Human Souls & Doggie Paws Group as well.

Come join us for an early winter hike up to Lonesome Lake in Franconia Notch.

This will be a nice hike starting from the Lafayette Campground up to Lonesome Lake and the AMC Lonesome Lake hut.

We can walk around the lake and also visit the hut to warm up (however dogs will need to remain outside as they are not allowed inside the hut).

Lonesome Lake is beautiful, especially in the winter time. After hiking around the lake and visiting the hut, we'll head back down to the trailhead.

An moderately-easy level hike to help us ease into winter hiking. Please bring stabilizers or micro-spikes and hiking poles. If there is enough snow on the ground and you want to bring snowshoes, that is also an option.

Remember to dress in layers.

Dogs should be on a leash if they are not under voice/whistle command.





Here are the totals for this hike:

Round trip Distance 3.34 mi
Hike Time (not including breaks) 2 hr 46 min
Elev Gain +1134 ft


Carpooling options:

Exit 2 off 93N (Salem): 8:30 am
Exit 14 off 93 N (LL Beans/Hannafords): 9:00 am

Don't forget to bring doggie treats, water for yourself and your dog and pooper bags

As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release, hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, and/or death, including those caused by negligence and or other reasons. You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.how_to_find_us: Plunk will be the cute beagle screaming "Over Here.....over here.......over here !!! "

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Lonesome Lake Hike
